channel.title: Deltascape problems

item.title: Deltascape problems
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:10, topic:245282”][quote author=Mikeyofadown link=topic=321705.msg2545061#msg2545061 date=1227228039]

what do you mean a switch statement?

A switch statement example would be

[code]
switch (int objectID) {

case 1123:
OpenUpBank();
break;

default:
println(“Object ID isn’t supported”);
break;

}[/code]
[/quote]

Fixed.[/quote]

Crazy ass white people.

Read full topic

what do you mean a switch statement?
[/quote]

A switch statement example would be

[code]
switch (int objectID) {

case 1123:
OpenUpBank();
break;

default:
println(“Object ID isn’t supported”);
break;

}[/code][/quote]

Fixed.

item.title: Deltascape problems
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“games4pros, post:1, topic:245282”]Hi, im editing a delta source and i was wondering … how do i make it so when u click on a door u get teleported to the other side. i know that before on my old server it was something like:

case 74: if(absX == 3008 && absY == 3515){ toX = 3007; toY = 3515; } else if(absX == 3007 && absY == 3515){ toX = 3008; toY = 3515; } break;

but on this one when i did that, compiled succesfully but when i click on the door nothign happens.
im using a client thats almost or exactly the same as deltascape’s so maybe the object ids are different but if thats the case anyone know where can i get the object ids or a client htat shows them. thnks[/quote]

well are you standing in the cords that you put in your case their?

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape problems
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

Hi, im editing a delta source and i was wondering … how do i make it so when u click on a door u get teleported to the other side. i know that before on my old server it was something like:

case 74: if(absX == 3008 && absY == 3515){ toX = 3007; toY = 3515; } else if(absX == 3007 && absY == 3515){ toX = 3008; toY = 3515; } break;

but on this one when i did that, compiled succesfully but when i click on the door nothign happens.
im using a client thats almost or exactly the same as deltascape’s so maybe the object ids are different but if thats the case anyone know where can i get the object ids or a client htat shows them. thnks

EDIT: AND ALSO WHERE DO I EDIT THE VARROCK TELEPORT SO IT TELEPORTS TO ANTOEHR PLACE INSTEAD? WHICH FILE

Read full topic
